verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm for the sons of Korah. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast been <S%H7521>favorable<s%> unto thy <S%H776>land<s%>; Thou hast brought <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>; Thou hast <S%H3680>covered<s%> all their <S%H2403>sin<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>
Thou hast taken <S%H622>away<s%> all thy <S%H5678>wrath<s%>; Thou hast <S%H7725>turned<s%> thyself from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of thine <S%H639>anger<s%>.
Turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H430>us<s%>, O God of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, And cause thine <S%H3708>indignation<s%> toward us to <S%H6565>cease<s%>.
Wilt thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us for <S%H5769>ever<s%>? Wilt thou draw <S%H4900>out<s%> thine <S%H639>anger<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>?
Wilt thou not <S%H2421>quicken<s%> us <S%H7725>again<s%>, That thy <S%H5971>people<s%> may rejoice in <S%H8055>thee<s%>?
Show <S%H7200><s%> us thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H5414>grant<s%> us thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.

I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> what <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%>; For he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and to his <S%H2623>saints<s%>: But let them not turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3690>folly<s%>.
Surely his <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>nigh<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3519>him<s%>, That glory may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in our <S%H776>land<s%>.
Mercy <S%H2617><s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> are met <S%H6298>together<s%>; <S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> have kissed each <S%H5401>other<s%>.
Truth <S%H571><s%> springeth <S%H6779>out<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; And <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> hath looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Yea <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah will <S%H5414>give<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%>; And our <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>increase<s%>.
Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7760>him<s%>, And shall make his <S%H6471>footsteps<s%> a way to walk <S%H1870>in<s%>.
